title: American Moral Obligations, McDonald’s Ice Cream SCANDAL 8.30.21
itunes:title: American Moral Obligations, McDonald’s Ice Cream SCANDAL 8.30.21
description:
In episode 979, Jack and Miles are joined by writer and Never Meet Your Heroes co-host Jabari Ali Davis to discuss America's selective empathy, the legal drama behind McDonald's ice cream machine, JR Smith's journey, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The long road to resettling Afghans in the US
  2. A school district opted out of a free meals program, saying students could ‘become spoiled’
  3. Supreme Court blocks Biden administration's eviction moratorium
  4. Analysis: Biden's Supreme Court losses prompt more 'shadow docket' scrutiny
  5. STEPHEN BREYER RETIRE HONORABLE BITCH
  6. Former McDonald's worker on why ice cream machines often seem to be broken
  7. Meet the 24-year-old who’s tracking every broken McDonald’s ice-cream machine in the US
  8. They Hacked McDonald’s Ice Cream Machines—and Started a Cold War
  9. Why the McFlurry Machine Company Just Got Hit With a Restraining Order
  10. The Fight for the “Right to Repair”
  11. Fix, or Toss? The ‘Right to Repair’ Movement Gains Ground
  12. President Joe Biden’s latest executive order is a huge win for right to repair
  13. 35-year-old JR Smith live tweeting his way through Freshman syllabus week is what this website was made for
  14. LISTEN: Chynna - 1.28.19

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
